title: Hey RIOT! I m talking to you! Your silence means too much!
body:
Hi Riot,

First of all, i want to thank you for doing a great job but... (always a "but")

I posted several comments concerning some problems of your game. I apologize for provocations but sometimes it s the only way to be heard or read.

" Delete GNAR! Stop censure! I m helping you RIOT! "

" RIOT = Gulty for the worst community i have ever seen! "

" Report RIOT, they smoke a lot for months "

In these posts, i m pointing problems and i have given you arguments!

Please just answer!

If not, you just look like your community or your community looks like you (as you prefer !). I mean: a lot of your kids are not able to consider or appreciate negative (but helpful) critics !

See you, enjoy the game and do not forget to have fun (IT'S A GAME !!!).

P.S.: Sry for my bad english but i think it is quite understandable.

you can also read these posts maybe you will learn something!

ok dude, it is your opinion. I never flame ! Can you give me any example (with the context of course)?

I defend my point of view, yes! and i do with arguments.
When i vote positively or negatively, i explain why !!! that is a responsible behavior of an adult !!! and i think it is helpful for RIOT and/or comunity. 

i have written short comments like "delete X champ" but i explain why in toher posts, to repeat would be "spams"

You can find in my posts agressivness. Yes, it is true. Why? Its a manner to be at the same level of some comments. I mean, when the comment means "bullshhit !!!" in a hidden way, i answer as an asshole !!!

However i often provoke, it is a way among others!!! you can dont like it, i respect that but respect me too ! 

For example, in this post, i said " I **apologize** for provocations but sometimes it s the only way to be heard or read." Again i m explaining why and i am sincere !

so don t judge me too fast.

i forgot my signature, dude !

See you, enjoy the game and don t forget to have fun (IT'S A GAME !).
